alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Franklin; Logan; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:28AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY, NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY, SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTY, NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTY, NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTY, AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTY THROUGH 400 AM EDT... At 327 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Marysville, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Springfield, Dublin, Hilliard, Marysville, Urbana, London, Jefferson, Plain City, West Jefferson, West Liberty, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, Choctaw Lake, New California, Lake Darby, Brighton, Milford Center, Lafayette, and South Vienna. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 64 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Franklin; Logan; Madison; Union
